mapper.sql:
WHERE 1=1
AND b.board_type = #{boardType}
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%')
AND b.writer LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{writer}), '%')
SELECT board_idx, board_type, title, content, writer, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(modify_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS modify_date FROM board b
mapper.select: ORDER BY b.board_idx DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT b.board_idx, b.title, b.board_type, b.content, b.writer, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(modify_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS modify_date, b.file_key1, (SELECT file_name FROM attached_file af WHERE af.file_key = b.file_key1) AS file_name1, b.file_key2, (SELECT file_name FROM attached_file af WHERE af.file_key = b.file_key2) AS file_name2, b.file_key3, (SELECT file_name FROM attached_file af WHERE af.file_key = b.file_key3) AS file_name3 FROM board b WHERE b.board_type = #{boardType} AND b.board_idx = #{boardIdx}
